kpis.title: ServiceHealthScore
kpis.search_time_compare: `get_full_itsi_summary_service_health_events(9eaef7b8-8d05-4a41-9868-df2ac7ef4c73)` [| stats count | addinfo | eval search= "earliest=" + tostring(info_min_time-(info_max_time-info_min_time))+ " latest=" + tostring(info_max_time) |fields search] | addinfo | eval bucket=if(_time<info_max_time-((info_max_time-info_min_time)/2), "last_window", "current_window") | stats avg(health_score) AS aggregate BY bucket | reverse | delta aggregate AS window_delta | search bucket=current_window | eval window_direction=if(window_delta >0, "increase", if(window_delta < 0, "decrease", "none"))

| eval avgcpu=100-avgcpuidle | search [ | rest splunk_server=local report_as=text service_id=9eaef7b8-8d05-4a41-9868-df2ac7ef4c73 kpi_id=dd85836a-aff7-40d3-82ac-2fce29a5edee entity_id_fields=host entity_alias_filtering_fields=host search_type=adhoc "/servicesNS/nobody/SA-ITOA/itoa_interface/generate_entity_filter" | return $value ] | `aggregate_raw_into_entity(avg, avgnetworkbytesout, "host")` | eval sec_grp = "default_itsi_security_group" | `match_entities(host, sec_grp)` | eval serviceid = "9eaef7b8-8d05-4a41-9868-df2ac7ef4c73" | `aggregate_entity_into_service(avg)` | `assess_severity(9eaef7b8-8d05-4a41-9868-df2ac7ef4c73, dd85836a-aff7-40d3-82ac-2fce29a5edee, true, true, true)` | eval kpi="Network Throughput - Bytes Out", urgency="5", alert_period="1", serviceid="9eaef7b8-8d05-4a41-9868-df2ac7ef4c73" | `assess_urgency` | `gettime`
